name: ShadedLight
description:
Created by just two people, here is the indie game that you've been dreaming for.

A darkness is ever creeping forward. It's one goal, to take the light. Your family has been protecting the light for generations, Slowly your family members past on, they can't protect it now... Now, it's you turn!

Protect the light in this ever proceeding journey, to not just protect the light, but to bring back light, color and ultimately hope.
